Text.Page:
Naturally, riding a beast this majestic takes a special saddle. You can't just slap something meant for a mere horse on top of a leopard.

It'll need to be tailor made to fit your rump. I suggest not cheapening out on the materials.4

Excellent choice! Supple noruk leather is just the right material for a saddle of this quality.

Now, let me sketch your rump, a few measurements...perfect! I'll get this made right away.4
Trust me on this. If the beast isn't comfortable, you won't be comfortable.
